summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates embedding functionality across a wide range of AI providers (e.g., OpenAI, Azure, Bedrock, Cohere, HuggingFace, Mistral, Gemini, Fireworks, Watsonx, Triton). It uses mock responses and fixtures to simulate API interactions, checking request formation, response handling, header propagation, rateâ€‘limit information, caching behavior, timeout handling, and image embedding support.
business_intent: Ensure reliable integration with external embedding services, guaranteeing that the application correctly constructs requests, processes diverse response formats, respects configuration options, and gracefully handles errors and edge cases across multiple vendor APIs.
